name: Glass Painting: Winter Art
description:
Dive into a real Christmas tale with a bright coloring puzzle Glass Painting: Winter Art. Create unique stained glass windows using a rich color palette, as well as various visual effects: sunlight, glare, frost patterns, snowfall. Master the skills of harmonious combination of landscape and stained glass. Fill in all available stained glass windows and unlock new ones!Game features:
  • colorful winter clicker arcade with puzzle elements;
  • stained glass patterns;
  • bright color palette;
  • visual effects: sunlight, snow, glare, frost patterns, etc.;
  • several levels;
  • unique landscape creation;
  • sharing function.
